testimonials

What Our
Clients Says

We had such a fun time crafting! Our host selected a very fun and flexible art project for us to enjoy and make our own. The owner/instructor Katie was amazing and the creative process scratched a part of my brain and heart that has been long neglected. I think EVERYONE would enjoy taking a class here!
Molly ThorpeKid Parent

BEHIND THE STUDIO

Meet the Owner

Meet Katie Ross, A Visionary With Over 10 Years Of Experience As A K-12 Art Educator. Passionate About Building A Creative Community, She Founded The Arts Creative To Offer A Safe Haven For Artistic Expression. With A Strong Commitment To Serving Her Community, She Brings Her Expertise And Enthusiasm To Every Interaction, Fostering A Space Where Creativity And Connection Thrive READ MORE
